casebody.data:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Matthew B. MURRAY. No. D-2752. Supreme Court of the United States Dec. 9, 2013.

Matthew B. Murray, of Charlottesville, Virginia, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
